name: adidas Handball Spezial
description: Once reserved for the handball court, these low-profile adidas sneakers now take centre stage on city streets. The Handball Spezial shoes revive an iconic '70s indoor sports style and give it a modern lifestyle spin. With a gum rubber outsole and synthetic suede upper, they deliver retro appeal and everyday comfort. Their minimal design and T-toe detail provide a sleek, versatile look, and the textile lining keeps things breathable and soft.

name: adidas The Grinch Forum Low
description: Celebrate your dedication toward your goals with the adidas Forum Low The Grinch. Inspired by Max, the faithful dog from ‘How the Grinch Stole Christmas’ by Dr. Seuss, these reworked Forum shoes stay true to the original. Accented by removable lace jewels, the comfy and luxe hairy suede upper adds bling to your everyday look. The lace closure offers a great fit, while the textile lining feels soft. The rubber outsole grips your steps well, so you spread happiness with every ride.
features: Lace closure with removable lace jewels

name: adidas Samba OG
description: Designed for football pitches and revolutionized on the streets, the adidas Samba OG is truly versatile. Staying true to Samba’s legacy, these full-grain leather sneakers double up on durability and flexibility. The gritty suede overlays and gold foil details bring an edgy yet sporty bling to your strides. Wrapping your feet is a synthetic leather lining inside for feel-good comfort. Finished with a gum rubber midsole and cupsole, the adidas Samba OG keeps your steps properly cushioned and firmly gripped, so you revel in confidence.
features: Gritty suede and gold foil details

name: adidas Handball Spezial
description: Once reserved for the handball court, these low-profile adidas sneakers now take centre stage on city streets. The Handball Spezial shoes revive an iconic '70s indoor sports style and give it a modern lifestyle spin. With a gum rubber outsole and synthetic suede upper, they deliver retro appeal and everyday comfort. Their minimal design and T-toe detail provide a sleek, versatile look, and the textile lining keeps things breathable and soft.

name: adidas Samba OG
description: adidas Samba OG shoes are a street style icon that celebrate the original adidas Samba design. The premium suede upper pops with thick 3-Stripes, plus laces to match. Long gone are the days of the Samba as just a football trainer. Now 70 years strong, its legacy as a lifestyle essential lives on. The reinforced toe cap and rubber outsole provide heritage-inspired durability and comfort. For a retro look with staying power, lace up these Sambas.

name: adidas Samba OG
description: adidas Samba OG shoes are a street style icon that celebrate the original adidas Samba design. The premium suede upper pops with thick 3-Stripes, plus laces to match. Long gone are the days of the Samba as just a football trainer. Now 70 years strong, its legacy as a lifestyle essential lives on. The reinforced toe cap and rubber outsole provide heritage-inspired durability and comfort. For a retro look with staying power, lace up these Sambas.

name: adidas Campus 00s
description: Although they made their debut on the hardwood, the adidas Campus shoes were quickly adopted just about everywhere else. With this pair, we move the iconic silhouette in another direction and add modern materials, colours and proportions. They're done with a premium leather upper lined with soft textile terry fabric, with all of it riding on an off-white midsole — a clear connect to the Campus legacy.

name: adidas Gazelle
description: A fan and streetwear favourite for a half century, this '60s-era football trainer is not done yet. These shoes are a direct reissue of the 1991 upgraded Gazelle, with authentic textures, materials and proportions. The upper is made of nubuck and features tonal trim and silver-coloured lettering.

name: adidas Gazelle
description: A fan and streetwear favourite for a half century, this '60s-era football trainer is not done yet. These shoes are a direct reissue of the 1991 upgraded Gazelle, with authentic textures, materials and proportions. The upper is made of nubuck and features tonal trim and silver-coloured lettering.

name: adidas Top 10
description: Feel like you are at the top of the world with the adidas Top 10. Made with a super premium leather upper, these shoes are luxury incarnate. The textile lining ensures durability, while the rubber outsole provides traction and grip like no other.

name: adidas Ozelia
description: Style rules come and go, but there's one rule you'll follow forever: Always be original. Inspired by the bold running silhouettes of the '90s, these adidas Ozelia Shoes grab attention with their eye-catching shape and soft terry towel details. An oversized embroidery lace jewel reminds you to step out with originality.

name: adidas Ozelia
description: Style rules come and go, but there's one rule you'll follow forever: Always be original. Inspired by the bold running silhouettes of the '90s, these adidas Ozelia Shoes grab attention with their eye-catching shape and soft terry towel details. An oversized embroidery lace jewel reminds you to step out with originality.

Long gone are the days of the Samba as just a football trainer. Now 70 years strong, its legacy as a lifestyle essential lives on. name: adidas Streetball Ii
description: Set no limit to your daily explorations, as the adidas Streetball 2.0 has you covered for everything. Versatile and stylish, these sneakers are perfect for your on and off the court adventures. The leather upper is super elegant and comfy, while the BOOST midsole with Lightstrike cushioning keeps your stride light and easy. Ensuring good grip and traction, the rubber outsole lets you move confidently and in style.
features: 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content

name: adidas Forum Bold
description: Express your personal style in these adidas Forum Bold Shoes. The trainers stay true to their '80s basketball roots while adding details like a platform outsole. Amp up the sophistication with premium leather and a subtle snakeskin deboss on the famous X-ankle detail. The terry lining and platform outsole add extra comfort. Wear them with your everyday jeans or your favourite outfit. Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

name: adidas Forum Bold
description: Express your personal style in these adidas Forum Bold Shoes. The trainers stay true to their '80s basketball roots while adding details like a platform outsole. name: adidas Campus 00s
description: Throw it back like no other in the adidas Campus. Made out of the hardwood needs, these shoes can do it all – from basketball to skating, the Campus has been a fan favorite around the world. The textile upper provides durability and a cool, jazzy look, while the leather lining ensures a premium feel. Enhance your traction both on ground and otherwise thanks to the rubber outsole – do it all and do it well in the adidas Campus.

name: adidas Zx 700Hd
description: adidas Originals lace up retro style low profile trainers with cushioned insole and EVA midsole for added comfort.

name: adidas Nizza Platform Low Friendship
description: Celebrate your go-getter attitude with the adidas Nizza Platform Low Friendship. Representing the ‘70s b-ball era and the ‘90s underground fashion scene, these sneakers add some edge to your style. Made with soft textile, the upper raises the bar of your comfort level while the lining inside feels snug round the clock. Fitted on a vulcanized rubber outsole for great traction, the adidas Nizza Platform Low Friendship takes your confidence to new heights.
features: Upper features at least 50% recycled content

name: adidas Ozweego
description: Right in the sweet spot between '90s style and futuristic innovation come these juniors' adidas OZWEEGO Shoes. An evolution of the famed retro runners, they fit snug, feel comfortable and look bold. Very bold. But there's no need to save them for special occasions. Easy-to-wear colours mean you can reach for them on weekdays, weekends or whenever. Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
features: Textile upper with suede and TPU overlays
